<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Unity](/Spells.aspx?ID=465)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 398 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You and 1 or more allies within range are targeted by a spell or ability that allows a saving throw.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** each ally targeted by the triggering spell
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You put up a united defense. Each ally can use your saving throw modifier instead of its own against the triggering spell. Each ally decides individually which modifier to use.
name: Unity
